articles.title: Sentencing in Megan Thee Stallion shooting stretches into second day - The Guardian
articles.description: Rapper Tory Lanez was found guilty in December 2022 of shooting fellow artist and prosecutors call for 13 years in prison
articles.content:
The sentencing hearing for the musician Tory Lanez will stretch into a second day on Tuesday, as the artist was set to be sentenced for shooting the fellow artist Megan Thee Stallion in 2020.
